content: MQS-RS rod-stiffener Galvanized pre-assembled threaded rod stiffener for attaching strut channel to a threaded rod to accommodate compression loads ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Pre-assembled connector Engineered for more secure and reliable fastening to MQ modular support systems Applications Attaching strut channel to a threaded rod to accommodate compression loads Reinforcing threaded rod trapezes against uplift loads ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Weight: 64 g Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Base material type | Modular Support ### ITEMS- 311943 - Rod Stiffener MQS-RS - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x VRS Rod stiffener
